channel.title: RuneFocus - THE START OF A NEW ADVENTURE
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JPJ9Uzc.png[/img]
RuneFocus is an extremely well concieved server that has been in development since December 2013. If you choose RuneFocus, we will not let you down. We strive to make your playing experience the best it can be. We guarantee an unforgettable RSPS environment filled with countless journeys. Whether they be toppling gargantuan bosses, triumphing over your foe in the wild or establishing wealth the likes have never been seen, we look forward to welcoming you to your new home, RuneFocus.
Website: http://www.runefocus.pk Client download: [url=http://runefocus.pk/forum/showthread.php?t=7]http://runefocus.pk/forum/showthread.php?t=7[/url]
Features:
-Generous starter-pack with all of the nessesities
-Customized experience rates for new players
-Good voting rewards
-ALL skills function as expected
-God Wars
-Active and helpful staff team
-Skilling teleports
-Smooth hybridding
-PVP oritented
-Numerous PVM bosses
-Fully Working Duel Arena
-Constant up-time
-PKP rewards system
-ACTIVE developers
-Friendly community
-Lag free
-Clan Chat / Loot Share
-Double EXP weekends
-Custom items
-Working spirit shields
-Frequent updates
Website: http://www.runefocus.pk
Media:
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/5e96c35eba71fa008f2f7b1588d8ae68.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/f8bUAMI.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/f44ea8e270380ac731e7360e51f79a13.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/75b940b9807b1bfe9ee22fe0694f625c.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/da295d03ba0f07a9c9b4210aa337ef32.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TuX3sQU.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZaIrXjv.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ubFTfjA.png?1[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/eef86ec7b5ab4ef9fbf7b16e579b07b9.png[/img]
Join our forums today and get yourself ingame! :)

item.title: RuneFocus - THE START OF A NEW ADVENTURE
item.dc:creator: @RuneFocus RuneFocus
item.description:
@RuneFocus wrote:

News:

We have just undergone a major graphics update, introducing new items, animations, characters and NPCs.

More information to come…

Read full topic

item.title: RuneFocus - THE START OF A NEW ADVENTURE
item.dc:creator: @Mr_187 Mr 187
item.description:
@Mr_187 wrote:

me and runefocus have a lot of history here and i’am enjoying every bit, hope you guys enjoy it to we got friendly staff and the best pkers yours truly “Harold” join today!

item.title: RuneFocus - THE START OF A NEW ADVENTURE
item.dc:creator: @RuneFocus RuneFocus
item.description:
@RuneFocus wrote:

^ This poster is completely full of it. The server has been up for two weeks and with a low number of players so far, we have three maxed players. It took me three weeks to get 99 crafting on RS. Have a nice day.

Read full topic
item.source: RuneFocus - THE START OF A NEW ADVENTURE

item.title: RuneFocus - THE START OF A NEW ADVENTURE
item.dc:creator: @DukeDice DukeDice
item.description:
@DukeDice wrote:

xp is incredibly slow, dont even bother unless you like a good grind. if you do go play runescape official, bout same rates.

Read full topic
item.source: RuneFocus - THE START OF A NEW ADVENTURE

item.title: RuneFocus - THE START OF A NEW ADVENTURE
item.dc:creator: @RuneFocus RuneFocus
item.description:
@RuneFocus wrote:

To put any licensing issues to rest:

We are going to be adding newer Chars,animations,gfx,items and maps. It is not a Near-Reality remake. Our forums are somewhat deceiving in that aspect - however the GreenFox template is actually quite popular and is used outside the RSPS world as well.

Read full topic
item.source: RuneFocus - THE START OF A NEW ADVENTURE

item.title: RuneFocus - THE START OF A NEW ADVENTURE
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Kodiak, post:11, topic:539493”]this literally looks like that near reality remake source with the data being reverted to 474. literally that is all[/quote]nope

It’s actually decent won’t say it great it does need some work but there is obvious work done I have to at least give them that.

Read full topic
item.source: RuneFocus - THE START OF A NEW ADVENTURE

item.title: RuneFocus - THE START OF A NEW ADVENTURE
item.dc:creator: @RuneFocus RuneFocus
item.description:
@RuneFocus wrote:

Not sure what a Nulled License is, but I can tell you that we have paid for the forum software and have Vbulletin forum account as such.

The server was a project for quite some time, starting in 2012, but some things got in the way. It has only just undergone major development, starting in 11/13.

Read full topic
item.source: RuneFocus - THE START OF A NEW ADVENTURE

item.title: RuneFocus - THE START OF A NEW ADVENTURE
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:8, topic:539493”][quote author=RuneFocus link=topic=658332.msg4403725#msg4403725 date=1391268895]
Then don’t join, I didn’t post this so people like you post useless stuff, if people find it good they will join.
[/quote]
If you’re going to have a hard time accepting feedback then I can only imagine when someone goes all out (should they ever) and give you feedback you don’t want to hear.[/quote]the client at least looks like some minor modifications have been done to it, has more than most surprisingly ( tuts or not)

it does look more appealing in game after at least getting on…one thing i would fix though is the welcoming interface is bugged that right there may make some people leave. It’s obvious though that this wasn’t just downloaded.

Read full topic
item.source: RuneFocus - THE START OF A NEW ADVENTURE

item.title: RuneFocus - THE START OF A NEW ADVENTURE

Yes it is, that’s the reason owners post pictures of the server to make people want to come online and see the rest of it. From the media, it’s not appealing.[/quote]
